usermenu.title: Mirai
usermenu.subheader: Sign in to access more features

streamHelp.title: How to add a new stream!
streamHelp.desc: Adding a stream is simple. Simply find a anime you want to watch and select 'Livestream this anime'.Â It's just that simple.

live.nofriends: None of your friends are currently streaming at the moment.

home.welcomeanon: Mirai. A new kind of streamer.

later.animetitle: Anime you want to check out later
later.mangatitle: Manga you want to check out later
later.animenone: It appears you got no anime to check out later...
later.manganone: It appears you got no manga to check out later...

settings.languageDesc: Change the language of the UX in Mirai (experimental, recommended to use en-us for now.)
settings.bgdesc: The background also changes the accent color of the UI
settings.nickplaceholder: Pick a decent nick... can be anything!
settings.usernameplaceholder: Change your username to something quite rememberable... this is your display name afterall!
settings.mottoplaceholder: Change your motto, make it your own!
settings.loggingprivate: Do you want your logs to be private?
settings.anilistdesc: The AniList syncing function enables your Mirai account to sync with your AniList account.
settings.maldesc: The MyAnimeList syncing function enables your Mirai account to sync with your MyAnimeList account.
settings.discorddesc: Sync your Mirai activity onto your Discord as a game. Requires you having Discord linked.
settings.contribdesc:
The contribution module as explained in the terms of usage allows Mirai to fund itself based on the processing power of the machine the user is on.
Understandably, this is a controversial way to support the project, therefore you have the option to disable it if you do not wish to use your machine to fund Mirai.

The module should take as little as possible of your processing power as to not damage or cripple your other uses.
settings.userdesc: Your username is your 'real' name on Mirai, treat it fairly.
settings.nickdesc: Your nickname explains more about you without having to be your display name!

setup.welcome: Welcome! Time to get you started.

explore.title: Explore
explore.topRatedDesc: The 'best' anime as decided by the community of AniList
explore.topPopularDesc: The most popular anime of all time

drama.title: Drama
drama.desc: Tears, conflict and much more awaits

show.episodeTooltip: With ongoing anime or manga, it can take up to 1 day for it to arrive avaliable on Mirai
show.author: and written by

reportModal.title: Report
reportModal.select: What do you wish to report this anime/manga for?

show.playthis: Play this anime from the beginning (or where you last left it at)
show.playthisM: Read this manga from the beginning (or where you last left it at)
show.unavaliable: Sadly this anime/manga is not avaliable to watch/read on Mirai yet, report this to the developer if you want it to eventually appear avaliable here in the near future.
